statements: UPDATE player_feedback SET rating = 5, review_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great experience!', player_id = 3 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game!', rating = 5 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE player_feedback SET rating = 4, review_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE player_id = 3
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, enjoyed playing it!', rating = 5 WHERE player_id = 101 AND feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Not bad, could be better' WHERE game_id = 201 AND reviewer_id = 301;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, enjoyed it a lot', rating = 5 WHERE player_id = 123 AND feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE GameReviews SET review_text = 'Not worth the money, disappointing experience', rating = 2, reviewer_id = 456 WHERE game_id = 789 AND review_id = 2;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE Reviews SET review_rating = 5, review_text = 'Excellent service' WHERE player_id = 1001;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!', feedback_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE feedback_id = 123;
UPDATE Reviews SET review_rating = 5, review_text = 'Excellent work!', review_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good job!' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Awesome game!' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, really enjoyed it!' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE game_ratings SET rating = 4 WHERE game_id = 102 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Negative feedback on new feature' WHERE feedback_id = 'a26b5b98-82c4-4187-a64d-7b54a6ae3003';
UPDATE GameRatings SET rating = 4, rating_date = '2022-07-15 08:30:00' WHERE rating_id = 'b0a03c42-61e5-4cb4-a2ae-3e8b2b017b24';

UPDATE GameRatings SET rating = 4, rating_date = '2022-05-21' WHERE game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND player_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
